properties.calculate_tax:
SELECT 
  *,
  ROUND(price * quantity, 2) AS subtotal,
ROUND(price * quantity * tax_rate, 2) AS tax_amount,
ROUND(price * quantity * (1 + tax_rate), 2) AS total_amount
FROM FLOWFILE

labels.label: Calculate and insert subtotal, tax_amount and total_amount.
